com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet.service

Interface ICommentService


  • public interface ICommentService
    Represents a comment service interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear(IRangeAddress range)
      Removes all comments in given range

      Sets the comments in the given range address.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         IComment comment)
        Sets comments to all cells in the given range
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress to which the comment will be added
        comment - the comment to be added
        See Also:
        IComment, IRangeAddress

      • set

        void set(IRangeAddress range,
         Consumer<ICommentBuilder> builderConsumer)
        Sets the comments in the given range address. For convenience, the user consumes a new instance of the ICommentBuilder into which the desired values will be filled in. The builder is instantiated from the IScellApiResolver so that the user could register his own implementation using custom default data. This function calls ICommentBuilder.build() and set(IRangeAddress, IComment) with the obtained data result
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress to which the comment will be added
        builderConsumer - the Consumer with a new instance of ICommentBuilder
        See Also:
        IComment, IRangeAddress

      • updateExisting

        void updateExisting(IRangeAddress range,
                    AddressItemEditor<IComment> editor)
        Edits comments in the given range. Calls the editor function for each cell (with or without the existing comment) in the range
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress to which the comment will be added
        editor - the function that gets the current cell comments and produces the new ones. If the editor returns null, the existing comment will be removed. It can throw the InterruptEditOperation to interrupt the operation
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IComment

      • clear

        void clear(IRangeAddress range)
        Removes all comments in given range
        Parameters:
        range - the IRangeAddress in which the comments will be removed
